## utils.Coordinate.sum() method

Returns the sum of two coordinates as a new Coordinate.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static sum(a: Coordinate | SVGPoint, b: Coordinate | SVGPoint): Coordinate;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  a | [Coordinate](./blockly.utils_namespace.coordinate_class.md) \| SVGPoint | An x/y coordinate. |
|  b | [Coordinate](./blockly.utils_namespace.coordinate_class.md) \| SVGPoint | An x/y coordinate. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Coordinate](./blockly.utils_namespace.coordinate_class.md)

A Coordinate representing the sum of the two coordinates.
